sentences.sentence: Gettext, a toolset that assists GNU packages in producing multi-lingual messages.
sentences.translation: 一个工具集，可以帮助GNU软件包生成多语言的消息。

sentences.sentence: Simple multi-lingual environments may need the ability to map languages one to one.
sentences.translation: 简单的多语种环境可能需要能够在语言之间进行映射。

sentences.sentence: Feeling good about answering the first two right thus far, I respond confidently, "mono-lingual, of course."
sentences.translation: 前面两个都答对了，因此我胸有成竹地说，“当然是一语学习者”
